Trade/Device Name(s): ImmuLisa Enhanced B2GP1 IgA Antibody ELISA
ImmuLisa Enhanced B2GP1 IgG Antibody ELISA
ImmuLisa Enhanced B2GP1 IgM Antibody ELISA
ImmuLisa Enhanced B2GP1 IgA/IgG/IgM Antibody ELISA
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Immco ImmuLisa Enhanced B2GP1 IgA/IgG/IgM Antibody ELISA assays for detection of β2-GPI autoantibodies in human serum
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in the diagnosis of autoimmune thrombotic disorders associated with antiphospholipid syndrome (APS) and APS with systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) by detecting β2-GPI IgA, IgG, and/or IgM antibodies in human serum, to be used in conjunction with other laboratory tests and clinical findings.
